comment: When I speak to people, they defend it by saying that they don't know anyone who's had a bad side effect. Yet if I reply to say that I don't know anyone that's had covid they say that doesn't mean it's not happening. Quite happy to deny and minimise jab side effects but not covid

comment: Only a small percentage of side effects are ever reported too so imagine what the real numbers are like. Furthermore, these are only the immediate, short term effects, I wonder what will the damage be in a year or so.
